title: University of Kalyani Recruitment 2025 - Apply for Junior Research Fellow Post
description: The University of Kalyani has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up vacancies for Junior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/B.Tech, M.Sc., and B.Pharm can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here, we include the age limit, selection process, and salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the University of Kalyani Recruitment 2025 . Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date...
